messages.message:
Here is the plan for this:

• Create a fresh stack with the correct tenant-id (aihub-preprod) and a temporary url
• Migrate release prep automation to point to new stack
• Change the url for the exisitng stack to temporary url
• set aihub-preprod to use the URL : aihub.preprod.instabase.com (http://aihub.preprod.instabase.com)
• destroy the old stack
All the data in current aihub.preprod.instabase.com (http://aihub.preprod.instabase.com) will be lost.

Any concerns with this approach ?
